external_games.name: Trainz 2022 DLC - NSW 81 Class SRA Pack

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: NSW 81 Class SRA Pack
summary: Build between 1982 and 1991 to replace the 1950s vintage 42 and 44 class locomotives these locomotives operated over most of NSW, and to Melbourne and Brisbane. This pack features the brightly painted Candy and Bicentennial livery units, with multiple weathering options, and other scripted features.
